title: Handle Maintenance Parts Ordering
description: A maintenance technician determines a crane needs a new gearbox. A parts supervisor must order it.

tasks.description: Receive a parts request from the technician for a specific gearbox part number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor receives the request for the replacement part.

tasks.description: Check the warehouse inventory to see if the part is in stock.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor finds that there are zero gearboxes of that type in stock.

tasks.description: Create a purchase order with the approved supplier for the gearbox and request expedited shipping.
tasks.expected_outcome: A PO is created and sent to the OEM supplier.
